Profile: test

The test profile is a focused workflow for testing tasks. It’s described as “testing utilities layered on top of base”.

Use it when

  • You want the assistant to focus on writing/running tests and interpreting failures
  • You want less “general exploration” and more test-oriented iteration

Expected characteristics

  • Base capabilities: filesystem + bash are still central
  • Task/workflow bias: tends to emphasize structured “do this, then that” sequences
  • Reduced breadth: compared to dev, often fewer extra integrations

Tradeoffs

  • Less suited for broad research/design tasks than dev
  • You may miss convenience agents/tools that aren’t part of the testing-focused set
